body.p: Most circuits are clockwise and consequently, the left front tyre takes the most wear and tear because the majority of bends are right-handed. If you are running on standard road tyres and your car belongs to the pre-348 series, you should check your tyre pressures after the first session (after which, most probably, the tyres are hot).

The most modern cars, 348, 355, and later series, running on special low-profile tyres, should not require pressure adjustment. Remember that any road tyre heats up quite quickly and you may suffer a reduction in traction towards the end of a session.
